title: Doom Axe
content:
Axe Location & Where to Find

Location: Zhentarim Hideout Merchant: Can be purchased from Brem, but first, you must help the Zhentarim during Find the Missing Shipment.

Doom Axe Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 65 GP Weight: 3.15 Kg. ID: UNI_DoomAxe

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ Artificial Leech ♦ Assassin's Shortsword ♦ Assassin's Touch ♦ Balduran's
